rules_text:
When Thrilled Archaeomancer enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If it wasn't cast from your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control instead.
Conceptualize {1}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
